info.ex_enigmaticlegacy.flying.stop: Your experience is over, and if you're still flying, don't fear, mysterious forces will get you safely to the ground

info.ex_enigmaticlegacy.bible: In the depths of a forgotten ruin, there is a legend about the books left behind by the gods. 'Some call it the Endless Book', while others call it the 'Eternal Forbidden Book'. It is said that the book floats in the endless void, and the words disappear like stars, and anyone who tries to open it will be bound by an unknown power, and according to legend, the book hides the secret treasures of countless ancient gods
info.ex_enigmaticlegacy.bible.subtitle: It Is A Book Left Behind By The Gods

The crystallization of life, pure creatures
The light of holiness, and the dark shadow of the order
The gods listen, and the holy shines brightly

item.ItemAncientAegis5.lore: damage, 40% of it is redirected at you.
item.black_hole_grimoire.lore1: A forbidden tome containing the secrets of gravitational collapse.
item.black_hole_grimoire.lore2: Those who wield it command the very fabric of spacetime itself,
item.black_hole_grimoire.lore3: bending reality to their will and consuming all in their path.
item.black_hole_grimoire.ability1: • Summons miniature black holes that devour everything nearby
item.black_hole_grimoire.ability2: • Creates a protective force field that repels all entities and projectiles
item.black_hole_grimoire.usage1: • Hold Right-Click to channel gravitational forces
item.black_hole_grimoire.usage2: • Black holes spawn randomly around your line of sight
item.black_hole_grimoire.warning1: §c⚠ WARNING: The gravitational pull increases exponentially near the event horizon
item.black_hole_grimoire.warning2: §c⚠ Entities within 2 blocks of a black hole cannot escape

item.scepter_of_sovereign.tooltip2: Right-click with Dead Substance to revive the latest fallen companion

item.ItemGhastlySkull2.lore: harboring the souls of the damned within its hollow eye sockets.

item.ghastly_skull.punishment: The skull punishes your hubris with searing pain!

item.ghastly_skull.final_death: The skull's power fades... Your time has come.

tooltip.powerring.brief: A powerful ring that grants access to expanded inventory
tooltip.powerring.desc1: This mystical ring connects to a dimensional storage space,
tooltip.powerring.desc2: allowing you to carry far more items than normal.

tooltip.powerring.feature2: • Store Ender Pearls and Ender Chest for quick access
tooltip.powerring.feature3: • Sort, filter, and organize items efficiently
